data.message:
When you are rich, everyone will be your friend.
When you are poor, no one will care  about you.
That is truth 
If you don,t believe just try it on your best friends. ....

replies.message:
It is so real. I had lots of friends but when I got hit by a car who
Never. Stop. I. Got two
Bad legs it so
True when you. Cannot. Go
Out they act
Like a nobody it hurts  no
Phone calls or cards  that what tell.  Me who  your are I fell
Bad and hurt  I just want to get well pray for me susan Davis susdv8@aol.com.
I love Facebook  because I can talk to family and friends and find more !!

I will pray for everyone of you to
God recover you be fine and have a nice life with your honest families and with dear friends ......
Thank you and you really speak the TRUTH! :-)
